health_score_breakdown.name: Aging Items
health_score_breakdown.description: Based on 16 critical items out of 40 total
recommendations: Consider closing or archiving abandoned items
Focus on 'To Do' items (avg 78 days old)

detail_items.summary: Highlight currently running simulation step in Blockly
Load Blockly block definitions from config file
Link object references to recipe manager
Block colour does not update until clicked
Create a licensing manager for ParaPro
Set ParaPro config to production mode
Set explicit checks on blockly blocks
Handshake Program Transfer between ParaPro and Machine

health_score_breakdown.name: Work In Progress
health_score_breakdown.description: 3 items in progress, 0 WIP limit violations
insights: All WIP limits are being respected

health_score_breakdown.name: Sprint Predictability
insights: Completion rate improving by 10.1% per sprint

jql_query: project = PARA ORDER BY created DESC

jql_queries.history: project = PARA AND statusCategory = Done AND resolved >= -52w

model_info.methodology_description: Uses random sampling from historical velocity data to simulate thousands of possible project outcomes, providing confidence intervals for completion dates.

scenario.description: Adding part-time developer (+25% capacity after ramp-up)
team_changes: Adding 0.5 part-time developer starting next sprint (ramp-up: 3.0 sprints)

scenarioBanner:
📊 Velocity Scenario Analysis

Scenario: Adding part-time developer (+25% capacity after ramp-up)

Impact: 1 sprint earlier at 85% confidence

This is the baseline forecast without any velocity adjustments.
